column7: ['• Family with young children', '• Queen Room with Balcony', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: I asked for a balcony & they gave me the one that I can only see the roof of the neighbourhood. Then, the 2nd night we stayed, I downgraded our room to cheaper one which is $30 cheaperand only to find out that our room bathroom/toilet edges are full of grabs.. I don't have time to complain since, we arrived from the city sight seeing around 11.45pm. Then, have to wake up early morning to catch our flight back home.
column9: I do like the location. It was walking distance from Rocher train station. The staff gave us an early check-in which we truly appreciated.

column6: “Not quite a 3 star, but then that is probably the reason it is so cheap and readily available”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Deluxe Double Room', '• Stayed 2 nights']
column8: They could sound proof the windows. Property is right next to a through fare for heavy duty trucks and vehicles, it is highly advisable to take ear plugs if you want to get some sleep.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Standard Double Room', '• Stayed 3 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8:
No WiFi connection during my entire stay. My bed was a futon which wasn’t what I had booked and the breakfast was not good. White bread with either Nutella or peanut butter and made into a toasted sandwich with a boiled egg. The dumplings were broken so didn’t try them. I don’t think food should be served on disposable plastic plates or hot drinks in plastic cups. Only ate breakfast the once in my 3 night stay. 
I don’t like the non cancellation policy either. Most inflexible.
column9: Good location. Helpful staff. Very good shower.

column6: “The staff is friendly, kind, patient & very informative.”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Group', '• Family Room', '• Stayed 1 night']
column8: so far so good.
column9: The staff is friendly, kind, patient & very informative. The room was spacious. The breakfast place is good because it's on the rooftop. The location is close to several restaurants that open until midnight.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Group', '• Standard Double Room', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: Nothing
column9: I arrived early before  checking in and use the bathroom, I noticed one of the rooms near the bathroom was used for storage as the door was open. To my surprise once checking in, it’s the room I was placed in. When I requested a room change there were no available rooms. The room was filthy. I tried to use the terrace on the roof and was told it wasn’t available to hotel guest. Breakfast was not provided due to maintenance issues. I asked for a manager in which he never came to address my complaints. Worse hotel I ever stayed in, in my life. Disgusting, disgustinf, disgusting, nasty dirty and poor customer service

column9: Hotel located at the most convenient place. Room was very comfortable with all the facilities and equipments. Walk only 3 mins to mrt located behind. A good place to stay. Easy to find foods as well. Definitely my first choice in the list if we're come back again!

column7: ['• Family with young children', '• Queen Room with Balcony', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: I asked for a balcony & they gave me the one that I can only see the roof of the neighbourhood. Then, the 2nd night we stayed, I downgraded our room to cheaper one which is $30 cheaperand only to find out that our room bathroom/toilet edges are full of grabs.. I don't have time to complain since, we arrived from the city sight seeing around 11.45pm. Then, have to wake up early morning to catch our flight back home.
column9: I do like the location. It was walking distance from Rocher train station. The staff gave us an early check-in which we truly appreciated.

column6: “Not quite a 3 star, but then that is probably the reason it is so cheap and readily available”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Deluxe Double Room', '• Stayed 2 nights']
column8: They could sound proof the windows. Property is right next to a through fare for heavy duty trucks and vehicles, it is highly advisable to take ear plugs if you want to get some sleep.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Standard Double Room', '• Stayed 3 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8:
No WiFi connection during my entire stay. My bed was a futon which wasn’t what I had booked and the breakfast was not good. White bread with either Nutella or peanut butter and made into a toasted sandwich with a boiled egg. The dumplings were broken so didn’t try them. I don’t think food should be served on disposable plastic plates or hot drinks in plastic cups. Only ate breakfast the once in my 3 night stay. 
I don’t like the non cancellation policy either. Most inflexible.
column9: Good location. Helpful staff. Very good shower.

column6: “The staff is friendly, kind, patient & very informative.”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Group', '• Family Room', '• Stayed 1 night']
column8: so far so good.
column9: The staff is friendly, kind, patient & very informative. The room was spacious. The breakfast place is good because it's on the rooftop. The location is close to several restaurants that open until midnight.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Group', '• Standard Double Room', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: Nothing
column9: I arrived early before  checking in and use the bathroom, I noticed one of the rooms near the bathroom was used for storage as the door was open. To my surprise once checking in, it’s the room I was placed in. When I requested a room change there were no available rooms. The room was filthy. I tried to use the terrace on the roof and was told it wasn’t available to hotel guest. Breakfast was not provided due to maintenance issues. I asked for a manager in which he never came to address my complaints. Worse hotel I ever stayed in, in my life. Disgusting, disgustinf, disgusting, nasty dirty and poor customer service

column9: Good value for money. Very basic breakfast and basic facilities. Decent location with great tube links and close to Marina Bay sands and China Town. A nice simple hotel but no luxuries.

column8: Room was very brightly lit even in the night time. Light was coming from the bathroom, that could not be covered. Causing less sleep in the nights. Nothing to hang clothes at bathroom.  Both these could have been easily solved. In addition it was very noisy and no windows at eye level.

column9: We stayed there for 5 nights Location,  very near to Rochar MRT 130m from exit B and 230m from newly inaugurated Downtown line Jalan Besar. Walkable from Bugis street and Little India Sera goon road as well.  The staff is courteous. The rooms although small is spice and span with toiletries provided is good and meets or exceeds expectations. Suitable for family.
